GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/collection.description: serves an array of all exhibition collections

GET /api/collection/id/:id_collection.description: return the collection with id = id_collection

GET /api/collection/:user_mail.description: return the collections with user_mail = user_mail

POST /api/collection.description: insert a new row in the collection table, return the collection inserted

PATCH /api/collection/:id_collection.description: update the row with collection = to id_collection and return the collection updated

DELETE /api/collection/:id_collection.description: delete the row with collection = to id_collection and return the collection deleted
